name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-oriented Senior Software Engineer with expertise in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Go**, **Clickhouse**, and **Tinybird**. Skilled in designing and implementing **streaming services** and **messaging systems** to enhance application performance. Adept in utilizing various frontend frameworks to create responsive user interfaces, with a strong focus on **performance profiling** and clean code practices. Proven track record in collaborating with cross-functional teams to solve complex problems in fast-paced environments. Recognized for driving improvements in technology and architecture across diverse sectors, delivering scalable, reliable, and user-centric applications.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** for the development of advanced frontend components, enhancing collaboration and performance profiling to improve application responsiveness by **25%**.
Implemented messaging systems leveraging **RabbitMQ** to ensure seamless communication between microservices, achieving **99%** timely alert delivery during high traffic periods.
Designed and optimized streaming services architecture, resulting in a **30%** increase in data processing speed while facilitating real-time analytics with **Clickhouse** and **Tinybird**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate frontend frameworks like **React** and **Ant Design**, improving UI/UX design which reduced user completion time by **30%**.
Developed a microservices-based Clinical Patient Management System (CPMS) using **Java (Spring Boot)**, resulting in **95%** accuracy in patient tracking through effective problem-solving strategies.
Established RESTful APIs utilizing **Spring Data JPA**, which improved data integrity by **40%** and ensured secure EHR integration through **Spring Security** and **OAuth2**.
Containerized microservices with **Docker**, streamlining deployment across environments and contributing to a **80%** reduction in deployment times using CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **AWS CodePipeline**.
Managed cloud infrastructure on **AWS EKS (Kubernetes)** with **Terraform**, achieving **99.9%** uptime through efficient load management with **Redis** caching.

• Leveraged **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** for developing robust backend services, enhancing system performance and reliability.
• Utilized **Go** for high-performance microservices, contributing to a 25% reduction in response times for ticketing and customer support.
• Implemented messaging systems using **Kafka** for a real-time notification architecture, achieving a **98%** timely notification rate for critical issues.
• Designed dynamic customer insights dashboards with **Vue.js** and **D3.js**, driving a **20%** improvement in resolution rates.
• Employed **performance profiling** techniques to identify and resolve bottlenecks, optimizing application efficiency.
• Automated deployment processes utilizing **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, ensuring a consistent and streamlined release process across environments.
• Architected infrastructure on **AWS EC2**, employing **Docker** and **Terraform**, resulting in a **50%** reduction in infrastructure setup time.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver open-source solutions, fostering community engagement and contributions.

Utilized **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** to enhance the functionality and efficiency of the application, while maintaining best practices in **performance profiling**.
Designed and implemented scalable solutions with **Go**, ensuring robust messaging systems and optimized streaming services.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, leveraging **open source** tools and frameworks to drive project success.
Continually improved system performance by conducting thorough **problem-solving** analysis, resulting in a **30%** reduction in downtime and improved user experience.
Engaged in effective **communication** strategies, leading to a **40%** increase in team productivity within development cycles.
Leveraged **Clickhouse** and **Tinybird** for data processing and streaming analytics, achieving higher data throughput and efficiency.
Developed responsive interfaces using various **frontend frameworks**, achieving a **40%** improvement in load times, resulting in enhanced user engagement.
Conducted performance profiling sessions that led to significant optimizations across the tech stack, including the usage of **AWS CloudFront** and **S3** for global deployment.
